# Devang Gaur - Personal Website
# https://devanggaur.com

## About
Devang Gaur is a Senior Product Manager specializing in global payments, AI-powered optimization, fraud detection, and risk management. 8+ years of experience at Adobe, PayPal, and Dell Technologies with $40M+ revenue impact.

## Professional Experience
- Senior Product Manager at Adobe (Current)
- Product Manager at PayPal
- Product Manager at Dell Technologies
- Master's in Information Systems Management from Carnegie Mellon University

## Expertise
- Payment Processing & Optimization
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Fraud Detection & Risk Management
- Product Management & Strategy
- PSD2 Compliance & 3DS2 Authentication
- Global Payment Solutions
